• font-size: 12vw;
    [size] 32vw;
  • /* set variation axis values */
  • --mono: "MONO" 0; /* Monospace: Sans (natural-width) or Mono (fixed-width) */
  • --casl: "CASL" 0; /* Casual: Linear to Casual */
  • --wght: "wght" 800; /* Weight: Light to ExtraBlack â€“ usually set with `font-weight` */
  • --slnt: "slnt" 0; /* Slant: 0 to -15 degrees */
  • --ital: "ital" 0.5;
    /* Italic: always roman, auto, or always italic */
  •  
  • /* apply axis values with CSS custom properties */
  • font-variation-settings: var(--mono), var(--casl), var(--wght), var(--slnt), var(--ital);
